description.short: Startup for TI AM355X BeagleBone board
description.abstract: The startup-ti-am355x-beaglebone program is responsible for the second stage initialization of the TI AM335x BeagleBone board. This stage mainly involves populating the syspage, which is an in-memory data structure that contains information about the system, such as memory size and location, information about the CPU(s), caches, clocks and timers, and interrupt subsystem. At runtime, the information in the syspage is accessed and used by procnto, and by various processes.
